articles.title: Android 12’s hidden App Pairs feature is incomplete but shows promise - XDA Developers
articles.description: Google is adding an App Pairs feature in Android 12, and it'll let you quickly launch multiple apps simultaneously in split-screen mode.
articles.content: In case you missed the deluge of news last week, Google released the first Developer Preview of Android 12, and we’re really excited about all the changes we’ve found so far. One of the changes we he… [+2841 chars]
